name: From Oblivion
description:
When my grandmother was diagnosed with Dementia, she started to change. She started to see the world very oddly, almost abstract. In this game I want to create this weird abstraction, caused by Dementia. The game does not really have an incentive or goal and has a creepy feel to it because of the unknown elements, which simulate the world as it could be with Dementia.

This game acted as a sort of playground for me, in learning Unreal Engine. That is the main reason I used several models from sketchfab and did not really focus on  finishing sound and gamedesign (incentives and story).
